channel.title: CWE-776 on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in CWE-776 on ZAP

item.title: Exponential Entity Expansion (Billion Laughs Attack)
item.description: An exponential entity expansion, or “billion laughs” attack is a type of denial-of-service (DoS) attack. It is aimed at parsers of markup languages like XML or YAML that allow macro expansions.
